name: Shtick's Game
description:
Team up with Shtick and make use of his incredible balance, dash ability, charm, and wit, to play his game and achieve the highest score possible!

Rules:
- Push cubes off the grid, before they timeout, to earn points.
- If you manage to collect a crystal by pushing a cube into it, you earn extra points.
- If a cube times out with a crystal on top of it, you lose points.
- You get 3 lives; You lose a life when a cube times out, or if you fall off the grid.
